sqlMap.select: select count(1) from general_parameter where LOWER($col$) LIKE LOWER('%'||#input#||'%')
sqlMap.insert: insert into general_parameter (GEN_PARAM_ID, GEN_PARAM_DESC, GEN_PARAM_VALUE, IS_ACTIVE) values (#genParamId#, #genParamDesc#, #genParamValue#, #isActive#)
sqlMap.update: update general_parameter set GEN_PARAM_DESC = #genParamDesc#, GEN_PARAM_VALUE = #genParamValue#, IS_ACTIVE = #isActive# where GEN_PARAM_ID = #genParamId#
